description: React component for an analytics dashboard page, including data generation, charts, KPI cards, filters, and layout.

classes.name: StatCard
classes.description: Component for displaying individual KPI metrics with icon, value, change indicator, and optional subtitle.

methods.name: generateGrowthData
methods.description: Generates mock revenue and user growth data over 12 months.

methods.name: generateFeatureUsage
methods.description: Creates mock feature usage data segmented by customer type.

methods.name: generatePlanDistribution
methods.description: Creates mock data for subscription plan distribution.

methods.name: generateTopAccounts
methods.description: Creates mock data for top customer accounts by engagement.

methods.name: generateCohortData
methods.description: Creates mock user retention data across cohorts over 6 weeks.

methods.name: CustomTooltip
methods.description: Custom tooltip component for charts, displaying label and payload details.
